case.state: This is super weird. I'm gonna... go find another table.
Whatever's going on here, I want nothing to do with it.
Uh... Bye.
What do you mean "Inner Demons!" What kind of bullshit is this? What sent you?
...Good to see you outside the Trials. Guess we'll see a lot of each other, huh?
*Brr...* Hopefully we don't see the fog roll in, tonight...
This flashlight's not that good in a Trial...
Strip poker? I guess it's a little less direct than just asking me to take my clothes off...
Oh? Strip poker? ...I'm guessing normal game night's not cutting it anymore.
Huh. Okay. I can't say I've made this particular bad decision before. Let's try it.
What the hell? I came here to play poker, not face my inner demons!
(She's really leaning into that whole creepy goth thing... at least she's dressed nice.)
That's a cute maid outfit. Points for theme. (But where did you get your tail and ears, Hot Topic? )
Hey, ~player~, you know this pint-sized girl, right? Are you sure she's not getting in over her head?
You're like something out of a comic book, aren't you, "Ladybug"? What's your superpower?
(Why is it always the tight leather outfits, or skin, or other stuff... Ugh.)
Leon! It's good to see you! Can you buy me a beer?
(She's so nervous. I wonder what she's got to hide. I don't think she's shy just weird.)
(Whoa... just being near this girl is pretty freaky... Is she like me? Or is she some kind of... monster?)
(Why do I get such a bad feeling about her...?)
(I'd really rather play with some more... normal people. But I guess creeps are... all I get.)
Uh huh, yep. Should've expected someone creepy like ~name~ to show up. Just don't try your luck with me, 'kay?
(I get such a weird feeling from ~name~...)
Love your hair, ~name~.
I've thought about growing my hair out... but it'd be a lot of work to take care of.
(I always can't help but wonder if the carpet matches the drapes.)
Love the messy hair look, ~name~. It's so in right now, right?
(I knew I'd meet some other people like me, but... it's always a little hard to trust.)
Cute freckles, ~name~.
(I wonder if ~name~ can hear me... Br... Not sure if that's hot or creepy...)
Hm. Nope. Is this like in a Trial, where you run into other versions of me? You? Us? Ugh. We're even striking the same pose.
Look, lady. I'm not here to talk about otherworlds and culty stuff, but if you're going to make a big deal out of it, we can settle this later.
I get the sense you're not... me me. But also not a demon, right?
I dunno, they aren't going to stop me, but let's see how you do, Leon!
Of all the guys I'd expect to play strip poker, you'd be pretty high on that list, Harrington!
My daddy always told me not to talk to strangers... but let's give this a try.
So when the game ends, how do we know who's the winner? If the goal's to get naked, then that seems like a bad prize.
I'm Cheryl. Cheryl Mason. I'm not from around here. I guess none of us are, huh?
~Cards.text~.
Swap this, keep that...
Ugh, it's like one of those puzzles...
Does someone actually control this? Or is it just luck?
...I could... no...
Hey, anyone want to buy me a drink? I'm old enough to, in Europe, anyway.
I'm not... scary, right? I might be like this for a bit longer, so... It's fine if you look.
I've done plenty of crazy, impossible things before. Just... not while naked.
Things are getting screwy around here, and I don't just mean weird.
Nice to see things going my way!
Whoa, these are pretty good...
Glad you can see more of what I can do, and less of what you can see under my clothes.
Aww... I know. This vest is so close to revealing something good... like my sweater.
Like I tell people on the crisis line: You gotta appreciate the small stuff, but be willing to let it go.
Average student my butt! I'm great at math, or whatever makes you good at cards!
It's not like I'm insecure about my appearance... but I just don't like mirrors. You can keep looking, I guess.
I always wondered what types of people played games like this... It makes it easier to be forward, right?
Are you looking because you're interested, or because you're afraid of something bad happening...?
...I'm perfectly fine taking care of myself. But... it's always nice to get help, huh?
One way or another, I guess we're all getting out of this together, huh?
C'mon, c'mon...
It's nice to hang out with people. Usually I'm kind of a loner... I just hope you all don't think I'm taking off my clothes to make some friends.
Almost over isn't over.
Did anyone see what kind of food they had out there? I could kill for a burger.
I've had more experiences with "Otherworlds," but this place doesn't feel like that... it's not normal, but it's not dangerous either...
Why is it always when you feel something's about to happen...
It's more fun when we get to talk to each other, right? Being super focused on the cards is kind of lame...
Nice.
What is it with fog, anyway? It always makes everything so much creepier. Can you believe some people find that comforting?
So... guessing you all couldn't get a date either?
I'm surprised how worked up some of you get over cards....
You can't just freak out over every setback, you know?
Not that I care, but it's annoying when people treat you differently and you haven't done anything wrong.
I know I'm not wearing as much of it now, but my outfit was pretty cute, right?
Actually, I've come to kind of like music through a static-y radio. The static sucks, but it's nice to hear something coming through regardless.
Do any of you journal? Like, write down your thoughts? ...I kind of think it's for weirdos... (Even if I end up doing it a lot.)
You ever... get a whiff of something unpleasant? Like a bad taste in your mouth, for no reason? Like... rust?
Isn't standing naked in front of strangers a sign you're having a nightmare? Mine are usually a lot worse than whatever this is.
Hm... as far as punishments go, there's worse things. But there are sure better ones...
*Sigh.*
Still kinda weird to be doing this with strangers. How about we at least be friends, to make it less weird?
Why is it always when you feel something's about to happen, it's rarely something good...?
Ugh. I am so tired of puzzles. You make a mistake and then this kind of thing happens.
(A chill down my spine... Well, at least that's something I've learned to trust.)
Bad things happen, but losing a hand of cards is hardly that bad.
Whatever...
Weird deja vu...
Damn it...
I'd know if the game was rigged... So I can live with normal bad luck .
Not yet...
If I manage to win here, that'd be nice.
H-Hey, be honest... I know I've got like... no ass, but it's still cute, right?
It's weird, but not necessarily in a bad way. Since I was here first, do you want me to be Cheryl or Heather? That seems easiest.
That works. You go ahead and be Cheryl. I'll be Heather tonight.
I really hope not. It'd be super messed up to get us naked before killing us...
Hey... Dwight... I'm kind of learning something new about myself... Since it's just us, could we, you know, talk a bit about the other girls?
Since it's just us... Do you mind if we talked about some of the other guys? I feel like we can let our guards down with each other.

state.text: Meg seems really impulsive... it's kind of mean, but... do you think she's ever... you know... with one of the killers?

Is it weird that I think Nea is pretty attractive? She's not super hot or anything, and she disappears without warning... but I like that she always sneaks extra supplies in to my medkits. I think there's something to that... for me, anyway.
Claudette's really smart, but people who fixate on stuff aren't... my type, as far as girls go. But I bet you two really get it each other. Do you, you know, like her?
Ugh... I kind of think... if I were going to try anything with a girl, Laurie'd be pretty incredible. It just feels like she'd never really be comfortable with anyone though, right?

I'm not sure I really get Min. Could be a language thing, but she talks like a video game character. But even still... is it weird if I think she's super cute? She seems to save me, anyway. Do you think...?

What's not to like about Kate? Her songs are so pretty, and she's so nice! Even with everything that happens! Sometimes I just want to kiss her as, um, thanks... But I don't think she'd go for that...

I really admire Jane. I know she's a celebrity, or whatever, but she sure knows how to just... be there and listen. My dad always gave the best hugs... but Jane's are easily number two. Maybe I'll be more like her someday.
Is it weird that I'd love to play this with Nancy? She's so serious, but when things are calmer, it seems like she'd be a lot of fun... and maybe curious? About this sort of stuff?
Isn't Yui just the coolest? She's such a badass, and never gives up on anyone. And those abs! Like... who wouldn't find her super hot, right?

Zarina's one of those people I just feel like I can't compete with. There's also an age gap, but... She became a world-class journalist after she lost her dad. I just... deal with supernatural bullshit having lost mine...

You're bi, right? I mean, I'm not sure if I am... but one time I ran across this other girl in a trial. And she looked a lot like me. I didn't get to chat with her before the killer got to her, but... Well, would you find someone who looks like you cute? Is that... bad?

Elodie's weirdly relatable. Not the lifetime of adventures or rich parents, but that she's struggled so hard against a cult... I don't know if you feel the same, but I wish I could spend all night talking to her.

Can you believe Yun-jin sometimes? It's bad enough her attitude sucks, but that she doesn't even bother to save us most of the time makes me want to pin her against a locker and give her a piece of my mind!
Is Jill your type? I notice you always go over to help her on generators. She seems to really respect you, too.

I don't know where Mikaela gets it, but she always seems to have coffee at the campfire, and tells great stories. It's also hilarious to chat with her about magic and stuff, she's got it all wrong... but it works for her. Plus... she's so cute!
Rebecca's really cute as a button, right? Even though she's so capable, I just want to scoop her up and keep her safe, you know? It's... nice to be around her.
Ada... Jeez. She's pretty, but it never feels like a conversation with her goes anywhere. I'm not like that, am I?

Haddie's super interesting. I don't know anyone else who wanted to go take on a cult because she felt like it. Kind of sucks she's stuck in the trials... but she's definitely a great friend to have... {small}And her butt looks great...
Thalita's super nice, but not nice enough to make her little "competitions" enough to make me feel better about being hunted by a monster. And I've heard the "go fly a kite" joke too many times.
Have you ever run into Cybil? She's super competent, but... I dunno. She apparently knew my dad, so it's hard to think of her as anything but an older colleague...
Lisa makes me feel so safe. I'm not sure if I'm into her... but she feels like she'd be nice to spend a lot of time with...

Claire's such a sweetheart, but she probably has a boyfriend, right? She never talks about girls. Just wondering if you... heard different. Or if you like her, maybe? She gives off big "needs to get laid" energy.
Have you ever done a trial with Sheva? That woman is built for danger. And she looks so hot and confident doing it. Maybe I could learn a bit from her...

Do you ever run into alternate versions of yourself...? I think I have. Considering how bad the Trials can get, if you swing that way, would... you know? That be so bad, with yourself? Or is it like... a different lifetime? I feel like I've run into that a lot.

Jake's really cute when he doesn't have a beard. But he feels... dangerous. You know? Not like some of the others. I'd love to get to know him more, but being near him makes me feel like I'm near one of the killers. Like in a sixth sense way.
I'd probably flip if I had to play this with Ace. He'd kick our asses, and he has that whole "dad' look going for him. But I can see him being cute. When he was younger.
Bill's a little old for me, but he's great to have around. He has a very creative way with words. Swear words, anyway.
David's great, but I can hardly understand what he says. But I think he sees me as one of the boys, which is... nice? From a tough guy like him. I'd love to see him outside the trials, beer in hand.

So... Quentin. Even though he looks so tired, he's super cute, and he always makes sure we're at our best. I know it's pretty self-centered of me, but given my own nightmares... I, um. Wouldn't mind helping him get a good night's rest...

Isn't David Tapp amazing? I know he insists on being professional and us calling him Detective, but he's really taught me a lot about how to stalk a stalker! He also figured out that aura stuff really quick!
I love Adam's accent. And he's so smart! He always has some unique tricks to share. It really makes you wonder how far that goes, right?

I think Jeff's taste in music is a little too... real for me, having lived through stuff like that before being pulled into the Fog. But he himself is so nice. Really strong, physically and emotionally...
Ash is great! He's like the weird uncle who isn't creepy, but gives you fireworks when you're too young to have them. Do you think any of the others would go for him?

Steve's got everything going for him. If he and Nancy aren't together, you think I have a chance? Who doesn't like a guy who cares about kids... and looks like he does? He's such a good guy, you know?

I have such mixed feelings about Felix. He's hot, smart, and has all kinds of professional experiences. Who wouldn't find that really attractive? But it's just... it feels unreal sometimes, you know? Like... yeah.
You think Leon and Ada are...? And if they're not, do you think I have a chance? He's like a golden retriever with an eight pack in terms of personality...
Jonah... Yeah... no.

I really like Yoichi. He's super reserved, but smart and focused. And he's like me, with the whole sixth sense stuff. I'd actually really like to take him out on a date. You think he'd go for it, or am I too much like the Onryo?

Yeah, Vittorio's been doing this longer than anyone else and kept his morals and blah blah blah... He's just not realistic about anything, even if he's taught me a few things about sensing the killer.
Renato is pretty competitive, but he is really cute in an awkward way. I bet he's more your type than mine, though.

Chris is gay, right? Considering how he looks and acts, you'd think he'd have no trouble with women.
...Wait, is he just not into me?
Carlos is super nice. But considering he'll always drop what he's doing to protect or save the other Raccoon City survivors, I can't really say I want to get closer to him.

case.state: (Hm. That doesn't seem good for Dwight... why do all the killers always go after him, anyway?)
(That seems like it's doomed to fail...)
Don't make this about me. If you're interested, you need to make a move, Leon. Or is Not Ada there gonna be upset?
Don't make this about me. If you're interested, you need to make a move, Leon. Or is Ada gonna be upset?
Tao, I get the feeling you and I are going to get along great. And Leon, if your new girlfriend is giving you permission, don't you think you should listen to her?
I'm not really a club person... But have you tried making people like they were part of something bigger?
Something sporty. Like... Racing boats?
So it's sort of like... a sixth sense, but for machines? That seems handy... or kind of like a premonition... Do you ever see things you don't want to, with it?
I think I had to have misheard you. You had a threesome with a vampire and a demon? <br>...Were they both guys?
Nagatoro, you know this is all in good fun, right? I mean, you're messing with ~player~... I'm messing with you... I'll take you out for ice cream after this. As friends, you know?
I'm not calling you loose. I mean, I shave too. I just think it looks cute. ...Also, not a natural blonde, so...
Also, I'm definitely not calling you loose. Just... Well, I like the way I look when I'm shaved. I'm sure you look even cuter.
I-I don't know why I said that-- Sorry, Mari!
I could never wear a thong under a skirt or a dress... I'd be so self conscious about flashing people that I'd have a hard time feeling sexy...
It's fine. (I'll be safe, at least...)
I get the feeling your little eye thingy didn't do anything fancy. But it clearly has meaning to you, right? My wristbands were pretty similar. My dad got them for me.
I get the feeling your little eye thingy didn't do anything fancy. But it clearly has meaning to you, right? My wristbands are pretty similar. My dad got them for me, but they don't do much.
I'm not sure about world history... but I could tell you about Silent Hill, or the Valtiel sect, if you're really curious... (And kind of morbid.)
Don't worry, Nagatoro. Everyone moves at a different pace. And... honestly, it helps to wait for someone you really like.
Do... persistent intrusive thoughts count? I just feel my heart race when I see anything that seems... off.
So what part of ~player~ are you going to get off to?
It's great you're so confident in your body. When I wear thongs, I always feel more awkward than sexy...
(Huh. That's a weirdly specific complaint to make.)
Wow, really? I know just the place!
I'm not sure if I'd prefer that were a euphemism or not...
My dad always wanted me to learn something. I got pretty good at the flute. But I'd loved to have learned to play bass guitar. But I guess I still could...
...Was it fun, at least? The two guys?
...Sure. I've dated a few. What do you want to know?
Interesting question... you looking for advice? I can help, not that I'm an expert.
The northeast of the United States are so pretty. Lots of creepy towns, sure... But it's so peaceful and quiet with a book and just you and the woods.
Be honest, are you hoping one of us says: "Perona, of course?"
H-hey... is that true? I didn't come here to deal with anything like that. (That's the exact worst thing that could happen here... At least they're not stalking me.)
You are really bad with women. Like, everyone owns white underwear... right?
I can wear something that's cute and functional. Just like me.
You're getting more of the hang of this. Try compliments, not confusion, Leon.
We'd be weirdos together. Writing things down helps with my anger, too, Aaravi.
Tsukasa, what... Do you have to write about? You seem pretty balanced, all things considered.
...I was thinking about what you said, Mitama. And... I just think it's weird to open up to a page or a person.

...I just realize... I didn't freak out over seeing your... N-not that I'm interested. I just expected to freak out... Silent Hill's... nightmarish. And a lot of it is about sex gone wrong, so I was worried that... A-anyway... Thanks, I guess?
Stop by Earth. I can show you a few nice ones. Or if we can zip around in that Dread thingy, we can see all kinds of them, right?
I guess you're right. But... I dunno. Maybe two guys at once? When both are trying to take care of me?
It's not like I'm going to call the President and say you're dating a witch from Silent Hill. I trust you. And that means... Well, I didn't come here just to undress.
I'm plenty capable on my own. I just... I trust you. And you're handsome and kind. I'm not going to go around telling the government I'm some... witch from Silent Hill if you don't.
I've thought about it. But it's easier to use a gun or just... hit them somewhere sensitive...
It's... I guess I'm trying to figure some things out. About myself. If it's thrilling, that'd be nice.
Yeah? I dunno, you'd look cute with a rough little pixie cut. It'd make you look badass.
I think like a bright red would make you look cool. But then maybe it'd wash out when you were swimming...
Hey, thanks! I did do a little bit of track in high school, and I run... well, a lot, these days.
I became a youth counsellor. I don't think I wanna be a doctor or anything, but maybe you could coach sports?
It's Cheryl. And I don't look cherry? W-what do you mean by that?
You may not remember this all the time but... Don't you get the sense that when things get weird in your world, you're consistent? That's... something I just sense about you.
Most of you are fine, but... Some of you pretty much suck. Or worse. I might not even mind playing with just guys if not for those weirdos.
Ugh. I was coming around on the idea on being the only girl here, but I just can't with some of you. It's so weird...
I meant what I said earlier, but... you guys haven't been so bad. Thanks for not, you know... making me uncomfortable.
You get why I was defensive earlier, don't you? Like, come on! I'm just one girl! But... you're all mostly okay. So, I'll keep going. For now, anyway.
(I'm not just going to... if I reach out... just a little...) There we go... That should help.
(If I get naked for a bunch of men, it's going to be on my terms... Even if it means I have to... draw on a little bit of that place...) Okay... Don't expect me to be your little crush just yet.
I guess... You know, I haven't not thought about... maybe more than one guy at a time...
...I... It's normal and healthy to fantasize, right? Even if it's about more than one guy taking care of you?
Hey! Wait a second, am I the only girl here? What kind of-- come on!
What kind of-- Am I seriously the only girl here? And you want me to-- really?
So... ladies night, then?
Um... I'm not really sure how I feel about playing only with other women... I'm not not sure though. You know?
I guess this is part of self-discovery too, right? Just women?

...I know that I'm not exactly hiding a whole lot, here, but even if I don't look in the mirror that often, I know I'm normal and cute-- Shit. Silent Hill is... a horrible place. And... I was worried it ruined a lot of things for me. So... thanks... for, um, showing me that.

I've... clearly got some challenges, but who doesn't, right? So, Silent Hill's... a horrible, horrible place. And... I was afraid that, you know, it might... catch up with me. But... I liked what I saw, and it was normal, and... I'm just really glad, thanks.
I... Ugh, fine. So Silent Hill's not just some quaint little town. It's this... horrible otherworld and... I'm just glad that I can appreciate sex. Without... well, being this weird.

Okay, uh... That might've been a bit of a weird reaction from me. Silent Hill's... a pretty terrible place. And I've been having nightmares and afraid that... you know, sex would be this horrible thing for me. But-- This is great.

That was... weird, right? So... Silent Hill preys on your fears, and... well, I'm just glad that I can still enjoy normal things like sex and... I know it's weird. But... you're all kind of weird too, in your own way, so that makes it easy to fit in.

...Silent Hill really preys on your worst fears. And it's not like I can just go get a date at the mall, you know. So... thanks. I like how normal all this is, even though you're all weirdos, you're weird like me, and that's nice. Thanks.
So, Nagatoro, how'd you get into sports? I'm pretty athletic, but it's mostly just because I'm a bit of a tomboy...
Did you ever think of doing foreign exchange? It never worked out for me, but I loved getting to know Akira, Nagatoro-san.
Because ~player~'s sooo gross... Do you get to go on a lot of dates? Or just sneak off behind the bleachers, Nagatoro?
Sigh. Nagatoro-san, I'm just gonna say it. I'm so jealous of your bust. It's such a hassle to try and run when you're either strapped down or flopping.
As much as I want to get you in a headlock... Wanna go grab some coffee after this, and just talk and hangout? Or you got any ideas, Nagatoro?
Sigh. Nagatoro, I can't believe you wore that outfit tonight. Why not something that shows your style, like me?
Nagatoro-san... You really think you can take me in a fight? I'll have you know I'm pretty tough!
Meia, what do you believe in? Cosmically? Do you believe in reincarnation? Or tarot decks?
I'd ask if you minded me asking a personal question, Nagatoro, but, I'm gonna just ask. How often do you get off? Like, alone, or with a friend...?
Nagatoro... just curious, do you swallow or spit? I feel like spitting is just more work...
Nagatoro, some guy I was seeing asked me about... the backdoor. Have you ever tried anything like that? It seems... Well, how do you feel about that?
H-hey, Nagatoro? Do you... um... Do you have any porn or erotica you'd like to recommend? My therapist says it's... w-well, I may as well ask.
Does it have a name? We don't have to talk about the plot if you don't want?
(I wonder if she doesn't want to say because it's kind of a lot...) So... you get off... not often, then?
I meant do you swallow during a blowjob... But now I want some juice. (This is a weird combination of feelings.)
I meant, backdoor as in... anal, Nagatoro...{!reset}
Meia, is this your first time seeing a man naked...? You're so... brave about it. (I don't even know if I am going to handle that well. What a pro!)
You're one heck of a lady, Meia. I've seen men naked before, but... I spent most of the game being freaked out by the idea. You're so brave.
I'll write lore facts later.
Glad to be joining you and Tao, Leon. Save some of those longing looks for me... At least for the next few minutes?
I know Tao's boobs are really cute, but I think you'll like mine too.
Don't worry, Tao. Just paving the way for you. And Leon...? I bet you've been looking forward this.
Tao, you've been really nice all day. I like him too, but... it's not a competition, is it?
Well... There might be one or two people I think are really cool. I guess it depends how good they are at getting me out of some tight situations...
I like to keep an open mind. But you're here because someone you like's here, right?
When you're chased by a psychotic cult that wants to use you to birth their God, you tend to hide however you can. Cheryl's my real name, though.
I'm almost kind of annoyed you've never jerked off to me.
Ugh, I know, I'm the worst. This is just... sort of new to me. I respect you a lot. Could we just try some dirty talk?
I'm not letting you live the "Secret Services" thing down. But... Tao, would you want in on this too? By this, I, uh, mean... me.
Sorry, that was... super rude of me, wasn't it?
I'm... Not a virgin or anything. I'm thinking more about sex and staying friends than dating. (He is a good man, though. Would I want something more?)
I'm never nervous. Just... ready to go, you know?
I've really talked a big game, haven't I, Kaz. And, thanks for the compliment. (Not that I mind it, but it'd have been nice if he'd flirted a little more about my personality...)
Thanks, Kaz. I've really talked a big game, but... keep the compliments coming, okay?
Sorry about that. It's hopefully just a "me" thing.
That easy to tell, huh? I'm not sure talking about it's going to be anything but a downer, but... I can appreciate you noticing.
That's a pretty good one, Revy. But I've gotten away from the boogeyman a few times. It'll take more than haunted house stuff to scare me.
Are you seriously going to do this to me, Leon?
Not that we really get time off from the Trials, but I can tell you really needed it if you're confusing me for a 40 something year old guy, Leon.
That obvious, huh? You don't exactly look like you've had a smooth ride, either, Dunban.
There's a few guys who've been to Silent Hill who aren't so bad... but yeah, wouldn't want to meet them here.
And what's that supposed to mean?
I call it the Otherworld. I don't know if it's quite the same, but there's plenty of monsters, all right... fog, and rust, and monsters.
Oh, totally a curse. But it's a curse that can do... interesting things, like this, I guess.
Leveling up... like... just getting better at whacking something with a lead pipe? I don't mind learning new perks, though.
Well, it's dyed, but I think I make it look really good, Jura. Maybe you're jealous that I can pull it off?
I've mostly figured it out on my own. But yeah. I've killed... Lots of monsters. (In one way or another, they were at least monsters to me...)
I figured I'd just hang out with some people with more worldly experience than other teenagers.
As long as you're not a creep, I think we'll get along just fine.
Sort of. Sometimes... I have these nightmares. And I'm pretty sure they're real. But... I also work as a youth counsellor.
I'm not a kid... I just...
So... Leon S. Kennedy... Secret agent... Spend much time thinking about what underwear I'm wearing?
Is that a genuine compliment I hear? I was bullied a lot so... I'll just take it for what it's worth.

That's a great question... Half the time, I feel like I'm in a bad dream, saving people from monsters and nightmares. The other half, that feels like it's just a dream, and I'm drinking bad coffee with my co-workers.
Well, glad I'm not taking my clothes off for nothing, then, Kaz. But yeah, I'm pretty interesting in my own right.
Well... not that's it's going to be a surprise, but I'm not a natural blonde, you know.
Right!? I'm glad we had the same idea. And that it's a bit more balanced.
That'd be pretty gross if you came here behind your boyfriend... or girlfriend, I guess... behind their back. (Do I give off energy like I'd have a girlfriend?)
No, it's not, Lysithea. Is that your idea of flirting? What're you going to ask next? Does the carpet match the drapes? Seriously.
Lys, I know you mean well, but you are so bad at talking to people.
You know, it's actually such a relief to hear that. You're a lot better at talking to people like I thought.
Yeah. That's exactly it. Though, it's not like I'm against meeting people here...
I'm not really sure what Crests are... but... You're a wizard, right? I've got... something going on, but I'm not sure. It's like... my thoughts affect the world around me.
